pullRequest.title: #1370: Introduce TransactionBuilder
pullRequest.bodyText:
Per #1370
Refactoring towards TransactionBuilder
Description

Add TransactionBuilder, refactor users of Transaction to use the builder instead of direct call to one of contructors
Remove constructors replacable by the builder

Motivation and Context

Tech debt & code quality

How Has This Been Tested?-

Unit-tests pass

Types of changes


 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

Checklist:



 My code follows the code style of this project.
 My change requires a change to the documentation.
 I have updated the documentation accordingly.
 Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
 Requires Activation Code (Hard Fork)


Other information:

nodes.bodyText:
Why did you change the byte array for RLPList? whats the rationale?
And why didn't you change it in subclasses?
Could we clone these fields in the innermost constructor?
Maybe, out of scope, but it could be nice to have RLP logic decoupled from Transaction class, at least in this constructor

commit.message: (#1370) Clone byte arrays & avoid null pointers
(#1370) Set default for value, gasPrice & gasLimit
(#1370) Add static factory method for Builder
(#1370) Prefer `byte[]` ctors in order to decouple from RLP
(#1370) Move defensive copying to the furthest ctor

beforeCommit.message: Merge branch 'issue-1370' of github.com:andreoss/rskj into issue-1370

afterCommit.message: (#1370) Move defensive copying to the furthest ctor
